Package bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d

Class Fit3DSiteAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d.Fit3DSiteAlignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Fit3D
    public class Fit3DSiteAlignment
extends java.lang.Object
implements Fit3D
    An implementation of an algorithm for pairwise comparision of structure sites (e.g. binding sites) that are not equal in size. This method iteratively extends a seed alignment until one site is fully aligned or a cutoff score is reached. Internally the Fit3DAlignment algorithm is used if exchanges should be considered.
